text.p: You have a Stamina of 20 or more, the first mate looks you over and decides you're a strong fellow, so you can get passage for a mere 4 Gold Pieces, if you're prepared to work aboard ship, slaving at rope-tarring and deck-scrubbing. You'll get a bunk to sleep in, but you'll have to provide your own food! If you want to accept this offer and can pay, the number of meals which you are told to consume during the journey aboard ship will be doubled. Otherwise you must travel by land.
Your Stamina is below 20, so you have to play the full fare of 10 Gold Pieces; otherwise you must travel by land.
